name: Can You Finish The Game ?
description:
Hello!  

Do you think that you can finish it? We will see! CYFTG (Can You Finish The Game?) is a puzzle platformer about just finishing the game! You woke up in a cave. Can you reach the end?... Maybe! .. With hundreds of tries! Not because it's hard but because it's easy! Hah ... It's a challenge! 

  Tools  

This might be useful if your are a game developer.

GameMaker Studio: The game engine.

Aseprite: For creating pixel-art.

Bfxr: For creating sounds.

  Credits

Whatsapp Group

Don't forget to share a screenshot when finish it!

Thank You!
